entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
